application.ref: A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

text.p: 3. Outcomes were ascertained from day 30 after the initial positive COVID-19 test result until end of follow up †. Adjustment through inverse probability weighting using predefined and algorithmically selected high-dimensional variables.
